name: Banner
desc: Displays a diagonal message above the corner of another widget.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget to show behind the banner.

fields.name: message
fields.desc: The message to show in the banner.

fields.name: location
fields.desc: Where to show the banner (e.g., the upper right corner).

fields.name: textStyle
fields.desc: The style of the text shown on the banner.

fields.name: shadow
fields.desc: The shadow properties for the banner.
